content: kitty bed by ashley dunham moonunitdesigns com this is a magical bed that your kitties will love for years to come it s crocheted while holding two strands at the same time so it s extra thick and plushy ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com yarn requirements; worsted weight acrylic 1575 yards 1440 2 meters ​ 29 98 ounces=5 skeins suggested yarns; red heart with love red heart super saver ​ finished size; 24 wide 3 deep ​ needle; 6 5mm k hook ​ other supplies; polyester stuffing stitch markers seaming pins ​ this project is made by crocheting with two strands of yarn held together at the same time i find the easiest way to work in this manner is to unravel two skeins of yarn then with a strand of each skein wind the yarn into one big double stranded ball that way there are no tangles that will slow you down later bed base is adapted from http //kandjdolls blogspot com/2014/07/free­rug­crochet­pattern html ​ by by sayjai thawornsupacharoen ​ ​ ​ bed base round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook place stitch marker at beginning of round 6 round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 round 3 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st around 18 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 24 round 5 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 30 round 6 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 2 sts 36 round 7 single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 42 round 8 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 3 sts 48 round 9 single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 54 ashley dunham 2015 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only moonunitdesigns com round 10 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 4 sts 60 round 11 single_crochet in next 9 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 66 round 12 single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 10 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 5 sts 72 round 13 single_crochet in next 11 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 78 round 14 single_crochet in next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 12 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 5 times single_crochet in next 6 sts 84 round 15 single_crochet in next 13 sts 2 single_crochet in next st around 90 round 16 single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 14 sts
